original_text: And they turned and fled toward the wilderness to the rock of Rimmon. Five thousand men of them were cut down in the highways. And they were pursued hard to Gidom, and 2,000 men of them were struck down.
korean_text: 그들이 몸을 돌려 광야로 도망하였으나 림몬 바위에 이르는 큰 길에서 이스라엘이 또 오천 명을 이삭 줍듯 하고 또 급히 그 뒤를 따라 기돔에 이르러 또 이천 명을 죽였으니

sentences.original_text: Five thousand men of them were cut down in the highways.
And they were pursued hard to Gidom,
and 2,000 men of them were struck down.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 이천 명이 죽임을 당했습니다.
